== How to Join Our IRC Channel ==

The IRC Channel for the Ubuntu Delaware Local Community Team is #ubuntu-us-de. You can visit it by clicking <nowiki>[[http://webchat.freenode.net/?channels=ubuntu-us-de|here]]</nowiki> or (if you are already in freenode) type the following command: /join #ubuntu-us-de
